aigct.etl.container
===================

.. py:module:: aigct.etl.container

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Class to simulate a proper Dependency Injection container.
   It could be reimplemented in the future if we decide to use
   a proper one. The interface, however, would remain the same.



Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   aigct.etl.container.VEETLContainer


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: VEETLContainer(config_file: str = './config/config.yaml')

   .. py:attribute:: _repo_session_context


   .. py:attribute:: _loader


   .. py:property:: loader
